item.title: 1036 W
item.description: score:1036 Chances: Shares of Wayfair (W) beat the market this week, gaining 9% through Thursday trading compared to a 2% decline in the wider market. Wayfair made important progress in the second quarter, particularly on the cost-cutting front, boosting its gross margin and reducing operating costs.
